plot: Commedian Lewis Black holds court over celebrities and other pop culture figures whom he accuses of being "the root of all evil."

plot_es: Commedian Lewis Black holds court over celebrities and other pop culture figures whom he accuses of being "the root of all evil."
title: Root of All Evil
